name: peripheral_nerve_stimulation_coverage
description: Indicates whether Peripheral Nerve Stimulation (PNS) is covered for relief of chronic intractable pain.

name: peripheral_nerve_field_stimulation_coverage
description: Indicates whether Peripheral Nerve Field Stimulation (PNFS) is covered. PNFS is currently not covered for any condition.

name: chronic_pain_minimum_duration_months
description: Minimum duration (3 months) of documented chronic and severe pain required for PNS coverage.

name: failure_less_invasive_treatment_modalities
description: Requirement for documented failure of less invasive treatment modalities and medications as an eligibility criterion for PNS.

name: surgical_contraindications_absent
description: Absence of surgical contraindications (e.g., infections, medical risks) as an eligibility criterion for PNS.

name: active_substance_abuse_absent
description: Absence of active substance abuse issues as an eligibility criterion for PNS.

name: formal_psychological_screening_by_mental_health_professional_required
description: Requirement for a formal psychological screening by a mental health professional as an eligibility criterion for PNS.

name: pns_trial_pain_intensity_reduction_percentage
description: Minimum percentage reduction (50%) in pain intensity required for a successful PNS stimulation trial before permanent implantation.

name: pns_trial_analgesic_medication_reduction_percentage
description: Minimum percentage reduction (50%) of analgesic medications required for a successful PNS stimulation trial.

name: pns_trial_functional_improvement_element_required
description: Requirement for showing some element of functional improvement for a successful PNS stimulation trial.

name: pns_trial_to_permanent_implant_ratio_threshold_for_review
description: Threshold (50%) for the trial to permanent implant ratio below which physicians will be subject to post-payment review.

name: procedure_code_CPT
description: CPT code for Percutaneous implantation of neurostimulator electrodes; peripheral nerve (excludes sacral nerve): 64555.

name: procedure_code_CPT_64555_annual_service_limit
description: Maximum number of services (two) for CPT 64555 allowed per 365 days.

name: pns_trial_leads_maximum
description: Maximum number of leads (four) allowed for PNS trials.

name: pns_trial_contacts_maximum
description: Maximum number of contacts (16) allowed for PNS trials.

name: pns_covered_diagnosis_conditions
description: Specific conditions for which PNS may be covered: occipital neuralgia, post-surgical neuropathic pain, cervicogenic headaches, treatment resistant migraines, neuropathic pain in the face related to trigeminal nerves, complex regional pain syndromes (type 1 and 2), pain due to peripheral nerve injury, post-surgical scar formation, nerve entrapment, painful mononeuropathy, painful amputation neuromas, intercostal and ilio-inguinal neuropathic pain.

name: pns_non_covered_diagnosis_conditions
description: Specific conditions for which PNS is NOT covered: fibromyalgia, phantom limb pain, diffuse polyneuropathy, nociceptive pain in trunk or lower back, or angina pectoris.
